turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, i am on my way out for a meeting, however i missed my morning coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like me to order one for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes go ahead. Order a latte from nearest Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where are you at now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm in 3rd avenue in Manhattan. So you can order one from any Starbucks within 2 blocks away.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is a Starbucks in the 5th avenue. What would you like to have?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm really in the mood for a Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you want a hot latte or iced one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What options do i have with the iced ones?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, there is the Juniper Latte and Iced eggnog latte. You also have Chestnut prime Latte available.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, none of that sounds great. I will go for a hot one. Order me a gingerbread one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm afraid Gingerbread is a seasonal Latte at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yeah, i forgot. Order me a Caffe Latte then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Would you like extra cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure i do, as always.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like some honey or some other flavors along with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, i think some honey will be good. It is organic honey right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they use organic honey there

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Then go ahead and place the order

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order is placed at the Starbucks in 5th Ave. The receipt will be sent to your phone shortly.
